Miami_Gardens.Golden Glades, Florida:
Golden Glades is a census-designated place (CDP) in Miami-Dade County, Florida, United States. The population was 33,145 at the 2010 census.
It is the location for a major highway interchange of the same name which connects the Florida Turnpike, Interstate 95, US 441, State Road 9, and the Palmetto Expressway.
